manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Faster and thicker hair Both rosemary and mint essential oils are known to increase blood circulation which allows for more oxygen to be carried to your scalp. More oxygen will stimulate your hair, resulting in faster and thicker hair. Longer and Heathier If increasing your hair length is one of your top hair concerns, then you have come to the right place. For the women wearing their hair in protective styles, just a couple drops of our Rosemary Mint Strengthening Oil at your roots is what you need to keep your strands long and luscious. Shinier Hair For a bouncy, natural style, use our Rosemary Mint Strengthening Shampoo and bring back shine to your curly hair! With a combination of our natural ingredients and commitment to a strict hair regime, your definition of healthy hair will be taken to a whole new level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brought back what I was missing..
reviews.reviewText: I am the type who is always rotating hair products to find the one that works the best and to ensure my hair doesn’t get used to something to where it no longer effectively works. This stuff is amazing. The smell is nice but not overpowering. It has tamed my frizz, made my hair silky again, and doesn’t leave it greasy. My hair is easily manageable and getting back to the state it was before hair dye! Highly recommend for anyone who has wavy, frizzy, knotty hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good. Seems like a good product.
reviews.reviewText: I've only had this for a week, so I'm not able to give long-term results if it actually thickens hair. I bought the shampoo, conditioner, hair mask, and the strengthening oil. The hair mask jar came with a seal across the top to help prevent any leaks in shipping. I opened it and the jar is full and new.After washing my hair even the first time, I was surprised that the hair strands felt thicker. It is impossible to grow more hair in a day obviously, but collectively my hair felt fuller. After washing with this. I put the oil on my thinning spots every night. A little goes a long way! It IS oil, and if you use too much it will leave your hair oily of course. Just use a little bit. I will try to update in 3 months and see what the results are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love how this makes my hair feel. I have very curly hair, but this really makes my curls soft and no frizz I love the way it smells too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Smell! Makes my scalp and ends feel nice!
reviews.reviewText: I always recommend Mielle products! My partner and I both use the shampoo and conditioner version, and so far my baby hairs have been growign more and my hair feels a lot fuller. I 100% say to try this product out of you want to start your hair growth journey!Context: I have 2c type hair, and my partner has 4b/4c type hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have recently purchased this shampoo, conditioner and oil for my thinning hair …I just started using it so I can’t really give results or opinions on it ..It does leave my hair very soft and conditioner works wonders for dry brittle and tangled hair. Great product! Look forward to future results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair loves it
reviews.reviewText: Great for scalp and hair. I noticed it reduced my hair fall. Give my hair nice shine and softness. Love the light scent. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for me
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo are perfect my hair grows back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stopped my overshedding
reviews.reviewText: It could be stress or nutrient deficiency or age, but my hair began to fall out, especially when I shampooed it and consistently yet exponentially after conditioning with conditioner. After trying some doctor recommended treatments, as well as using mielle rosemary oil, the hair loss lessened, but was still noticeable when I shampooed it, and super excessive when I conditioned it. Everytime I conditioned my hair, my hair would fall out in greater clumps and litter the shower curtains and walls and clog the drains. I began to fear conditioning my hair. I was skeptical of how much repair a topical shampoo could do and so I bought the mielle shampoo but not the conditioner. The first time I used the mielle rosemary shampoo, the hair loss was next to none. But I paired it with a popular conditioner (not mielle) and my hair fell out in clumps again. A couple of weeks later, I decided to give the mielle conditioner a try and did so yesterday, using the mielle shampoo beforehand. And for the first time in 10 months, I did not lose a single hair in the shower. Not one. There were no hairs in my hands, none on the shower walls, none washing down the drain, absolutely no hair fell out or shedd off. I was stunned. I let the water run down my body in the shower while I stood in disbelief and inspected the shower curtains for runaway shedding...... There was none. This is my miracle. This is my story of using mielle.
